00037 void Packet::Serialize(const int fd) const
00038 {
00039   size_t num;
00040 
00041   num=headers.size();
00042   if (writeall(fd,(char*)&num,sizeof(num))!=sizeof(num)) {
00043     throw SerializationException();
00044   }
00045   for (std::deque<Header>::const_iterator p=headers.begin();p!=headers.end();p++) {
00046     (*p).Serialize(fd);
00047   }
00048   payload.Serialize(fd);
00049   num=trailers.size();
00050   if (writeall(fd,(char*)&num,sizeof(num))!=sizeof(num)) {
00051     throw SerializationException();
00052   }
00053   for (std::deque<Trailer>::const_iterator p=trailers.begin();p!=trailers.end();p++) {
00054     (*p).Serialize(fd);
00055   }
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 void Packet::Unserialize(const int fd)
00060 {
00061   size_t num;
00062   unsigned i;
00063 
00064   headers.clear();
00065   payload.Clear();
00066   trailers.clear();
00067 
00068   if (readall(fd,(char*)&num,sizeof(num))!=sizeof(num)) {
00069     throw SerializationException();
00070   }
00071   for (i=0;i<num;i++) {
00072     Header h;
00073     h.Unserialize(fd);
00074     headers.push_back(h);
00075   }
00076   payload.Unserialize(fd);
00077   if (readall(fd,(char*)&num,sizeof(num))!=sizeof(num)) {
00078     throw SerializationException();
00079   }
00080   for (i=0;i<num;i++) {
00081     Trailer t;
00082     t.Unserialize(fd);
00083     trailers.push_back(t);
00084   }
00085 }

00087 size_t Packet::GetRawSize() const
00088 {
00089   size_t sum=0;
00090 
00091   for (std::deque<Header>::const_iterator p=headers.begin();p!=headers.end();p++) {
00092     sum+=(*p).GetSize();
00093   }
00094   sum+=payload.GetSize();
00095   for (std::deque<Trailer>::const_iterator p=trailers.begin();p!=trailers.end();p++) {
00096     sum+=(*p).GetSize();
00097   }
00098   return sum;
00099 }

00102 void Packet::DupeRaw(char * buf, size_t size) const
00103 {
00104   int offset=0;
00105 
00106   assert(size>=GetRawSize());
00107 
00108   for (std::deque<Header>::const_iterator p=headers.begin();p!=headers.end();p++) {
00109     (*p).GetData(&(buf[offset]),(*p).GetSize(),0);
00110     offset+=(*p).GetSize();
00111   }
00112   payload.GetData(&(buf[offset]),payload.GetSize(),0);
00113   offset+=payload.GetSize();
00114   for (std::deque<Trailer>::const_iterator p=trailers.begin();p!=trailers.end();p++) {
00115     (*p).GetData(&(buf[offset]),(*p).GetSize(),0);
00116     offset+=(*p).GetSize();
00117   }
00118 }

00121 void Packet::WriteRaw(const int fd) const
00122 {
00123   char *buf = new char [GetRawSize()];
00124 
00125   DupeRaw(buf,GetRawSize());
00126 
00127   writeall(fd,buf,GetRawSize());
00128 }

00165 template <class T, typename TAGTYPE>
00166 struct find_pred : public std::unary_function<T,bool> {
00167   TAGTYPE tag;
00168   find_pred(const TAGTYPE &t) : tag(t) {}
00169   bool operator() (T rhs) { return rhs.GetTag()==tag; }
00170 };

00173 Header &  Packet::FindHeader(Headers::HeaderType ht) const
00174 {
00175   std::deque<Header>::const_iterator i = find_if(headers.begin(), headers.end(), find_pred<Header,Headers::HeaderType>(ht));
00176   return *(new Header(*i));
00177 }

00179 void Packet::SetHeader(const Header &h)
00180 {
00181   replace_if(headers.begin(), headers.end(), find_pred<Header,Headers::HeaderType>(h.GetTag()), h);
00182 }

00184 Trailer & Packet::FindTrailer(Trailers::TrailerType ht) const
00185 {
00186   std::deque<Trailer>::const_iterator i = find_if(trailers.begin(), trailers.end(), find_pred<Trailer,Trailers::TrailerType>(ht));
00187   return *(new Trailer(*i));

00190 void Packet::SetTrailer(const Trailer &h)
00191 {

00236 void Packet::ExtractHeaderFromPayload(Headers::HeaderType type, size_t size)
00237 {
00238   headers.push_back(Header(type,payload.ExtractFront(size)));
00239 }
00240 
00241 void Packet::ExtractTrailerFromPayload(Trailers::TrailerType type, size_t size)
00242 {
00243   trailers.push_front(Trailer(type,payload.ExtractBack(size)));
00244 }

00247 std::ostream & Packet::Print(std::ostream &os) const
00248 {
00249   os << "Packet(headers={";
00250   for_each(headers.begin(), headers.end(),PrintFunc<Header>(os));
00251   os << "}, payload=";
00252   os << payload ;
00253   os << ", trailers={";
00254   for_each(trailers.begin(), trailers.end(),PrintFunc<Trailer>(os));
00255   os << "}";
00256   os << ")";
00257   return os;
00258 }
